dct_description_sm: In French. “Pag. 7.” (top right); island of California unlabeled; Continents labeled as well as the I. Salomon, I. de Feu, N Zelande, and Diemens. Issued in: Géographie universelle, exposée dans les diferentes méthodes qui peuvent abréger l’étude ..., Sxiéme édition. -- A Paris: Chez Pierre-François Giffart, rue S. Jacques, à Sainte Thérèse, M.DCC.XXXIX (1739). Dimensions: 12.7 x 17.3 cm.; 13.7 x 17.3 cm. to the border. Reissued in 1749

Variant In French. “Pag. 7.” (top right); island of California unlabeled; Continents labeled as well as the I. Salomon, I. de Feu, N Zelande, and Diemens. A different plate with the title elongated over across the top of the map and the text inside the land masses placed differently than in State 1. Issued in: Pratique de la Mémoire Artificielle, pour apprendre et pour retenia la Geographie Universelle..., Tome III. – Par le P. Buffier, de la Compagnie de Jesus. -- A Paris: Chez Pierre-François Giffart, rue S. Jacques, à Sainte Thérèse, M.DCC.XL (1740). Dimensions: 12.7 x 17.3 cm.; 13.7 x 17.3 cm. to the border.

In French. With title: MAPPE-MONDE “Page. 7.” (top left), “faure Sculp.” (bottom right); island of California unlabeled; Continents labeled as well as the I. Salomon, I. de Feu, Nzelande, and Diemens. Issued in: Géographie universelle, exposée dans les differentes méthodes qui peuvent abréger l’étude ..., Huitieme édition. -- A Paris: Chez Pierre-François Giffart, rue S. Jacques, à Sainte Thérèse, M. DCC. LIX (1759). Dimensions: 12.7 x 17.3 cm.; 13.7 x 17.3 cm. to the border.

In French. With title: MAPPE MONDE. “Pag 7.” (top right); island of California unlabeled; Continents labeled as well as the I. Salomon, I. de Feu, Nzelande, and Diemens. Issued in: Géographie universelle, exposée dans les differentes méthodes qui peuvent abréger l’étude ..., Huitieme édition. -- A Paris: Chez Pierre-François Giffart, rue S. Jacques, à Sainte Thérèse, M. DCC. LIX (1759). Reissued in 1760, 1764, 1781. Dimensions: 12.7 x 17.3 cm.; 13.7 x 17.3 cm. to the border.

In French. With title: MAPPE MONDE (with no period at the end) and without page number. Issued in his: Geographie Universelle ... Par le P. Buffier de la Compagnie de Jesus, Paris, MDCCLXXIII (1773). Dimensions: 12.6 x 17.4 cm.; 13.5 x 17.4 cm. to the border.

In French. With title as in State 3, with “Pag. 7.” (top right, above the top border); ); island of California unlabeled; Continents labeled as well as the I. Salomon, I. de Feu, Nzelande, and Diemens. Issued in: Géographie universelle, exposée dans les différentes méthodes qui peuvent abréger l’étude ..., Derniere édition. -- A Paris, & se vende à Liege, Chez J. F. Bassompierre, Imprimeur de Son Altesse, au Moriane, vis-à-vis l’Eglife Ste. Catherine. M. DCC. LXXXV. (1785).

In Italian. With title: MAPPAMONDO “Pag. 7” (top left), faint “p. 6” (top right). California unlabeled. No internally labeled points, only the continents are named. Issued in his: Geografia Universale espost a nei differenti metodi .. .dal P. Buffier ... quarta edizione ... Appresso Francesco Pitteri. -- In Venezia, MDCCXLVII (1747). Dimensions: 12.9 x 17.0 cm.; 13.3 x 17.2 to the border.

In Italian. With title: MAPPAMONDO. “Pag. 6.” (top right). California labeled California I. Numerous points labeled inside each continent. With I. del Fuoco. N. Zelanda, and I di Diemen. Issued in his: Geografia Universale del Padre Claudio Buffier ... edizione nona ... Appresso Francesco Pitteri. -- In Venezia, MDCCLXXII (1772). Dimensions: 12.9 x 17.0 cm.; 13.3 x 17.2 to the border.

In Italian. With unchanged title. “Pag. 70.” (top left). “Filippo de Grado Reg. Incisore. Napoli.” (bottom right). California is unlabeled. No internally labeled points, only the continents are named. Issued in: Geografia universale del P. Buffier aumentata, e correita con un nuovo trattato della sfera del P. Fran. Jacquier ... Nuova edizione. -- In Napoli: Presso Gennar Migliacco. MDCCLXXXII (1782). Dimensions: 12.6 x 17.1 cm. (Book includes a Western Hemisphere map showing California as an island.)

In Italian. With unchanged title and lacking page number. With “Petroschi inc.” (bottom left). Issued in his: Geografia universale del P. Buffier Edizione prima Romana Avmentata, corretta, et ridotta in miglior forma ... e progresso della Geografia dal P. Francesco Jacquier. -- In Roma, MDCCLXXV (1775). Dimensions: 12.7 x 16.7 cm. Issued in: Nuova geografia del P. Buffier edizione seconda Romana ... del P. Jacquier. -- In Roma, MDCCLXXXVII (1787). (Book includes a Western Hemisphere map showing California as an island, and map of North America showing California as a peninsula.)
California with a rounded northern coast. The States listed identify differences between very similar maps and may, with additional research, be rearranged.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
